div.head: Description of changes for 2012.08
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It a first draft copied from a diplomatic transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. It awaits corrections and additions pending a collation comparision of available manuscript witnesses. Some cross references are present, but citations and a critical apparatus still await construction.
